event_registry_properties.name: action
event_registry_properties.item: Schedule a repair procedure to replace the affected FRU.
event_registry_properties.name: description
event_registry_properties.item: A fan is spinning below the programmed speed in an External I/O Expansion Unit FRU
event_registry_properties.name: details
event_registry_properties.item:
The fan rotational speed is below the programmed speed. This indicates an impending fan failure and may also result in over temperature conditions ifallowed to continue.

The PSU containing this fan will be called out for replacement.

Follow the steps below to obtain the necessary data for presentation to your authorized service provider.

Step 1: Collect the fault message.
A single line fault message is displayed to the system console and logged in the /var/logs/message file. The complete message may be retrieved by using the 'fmdump' command on the XSCF console as shown below.

Example:

LEGEND:
RED = SUNW-MSG-ID
BLUE = EVENT_ID
GREEN = FRU

XSCF> fmdump -m
   MSG-ID: IOXSCF-8000-53, TYPE: Fault, VER: 1, SEVERITY: Major
   EVENT-TIME: Tue Mar 27 05:57:49 PDT 2007
   PLATFORM: SPARC-Enterprise, CSN: BE80601000, HOSTNAME: server-0
   SOURCE: sde, REV: 1.12
   EVENT-ID: 6aa4a8d9-0026-4b46-9ec7-1828c0eeb16e
   DESC: A fan is spinning below the programmed speed in an External I/O Expansion Unit FRU
   Refer to http://www.sun.com/msg/IOXSCF-8000-53 for more information.
   AUTO-RESPONSE: No immediate action is taken
   IMPACT: Hardware may experience thermal failures if fan is not replaced.
   REC-ACTION: Schedule a repair procedure to replace the affected FRU.

Step 2: Collect the "fmdump" output.
Use the fmdump command with the Event-ID option to retrieve more information on the fault which has occurred.

Example: 

XSCF> fmdump -v -u 6aa4a8d9-0026-4b46-9ec7-1828c0eeb16e
   TIME                 UUID                                 MSG-ID
   Mar 27 05:57:49.1065 6aa4a8d9-0026-4b46-9ec7-1828c0eeb16e IOXSCF-8000-53
          100% fault.chassis.iox.device.fan.tooslow
          Problem in: hc:///iox=983392/ps=0/fan=0
             Affects: -
                 FRU: hc://:product-id=SPARC-Enterprise:chassisid=BE80601000:server-id=server-
0:serial=T00560:part=3001701:revision=02/component=IOX@X031/PS0

Step 3: Provide the output collected to your service provider.
The information collected above will help your service provider to schedule a repair at your convenience.
event_registry_properties.name: impact
event_registry_properties.item: Hardware may experience thermal failures if fan is not replaced.
event_registry_properties.name: response
title
event_registry_properties.item: External I/O Expansion Unit fan failure
